  Source   Edit

Base interface for pubsub protocols

You can subscribe to a topic, publish something on it, and eventually unsubscribe from it.

Imports

errors, pubsubpeer, rpc/message, rpc/messages, rpc/protobuf, ../../switch, ../protocol, ../../crypto/crypto, ../../stream/connection, ../../peerid, ../../peerinfo, ../../errors, ../../utility
